title: Spicy beetroot and coconut soup with herby yoghurt
description: Simon says that this is one of the most stunning soups you will ever make. It's both earthy and spicy at the same time, and it has a great pink colour.
ingredients: 3 red chillies, deseeded if you don't want too much heat
2 banana shallots(or 4 round shallots), finely chopped
500g/1lb 2oz ready cooked beetroot (not the kind prepared with vinegar), chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
